title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Meanwhile, fry the minced meat with onions and garlic.
Serve the sauce on top of spaghetti.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: Grill the chicken breast and slice it.
Toss together lettuce, parmesan, and croutons.

title: Vegetarian Pizza
steps: Apply tomato sauce and sprinkle mozzarella.
Add bell pepper, mushrooms, and olives.
Bake in a preheated oven at 220C until cheese is melted and crust is golden.
